summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; establishing a Sub-Fund within the Engineering Department Operating Fund to be known as the "Vanpool Operating Fund"; providing for deposits therein and expenditures therefrom; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Engineering Department Operating Fund; authorizing said sub-fund to be held in an interest bearing account to be drawn upon as costs are incurred; and authorizing the Mayor to enter into and execute agreements.
